com.tremorvideo.sdk.android.videoad

Class AdViewManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tremorvideo.sdk.android.videoad.AdViewManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.tremorvideo.sdk.android.videoad.AdView.Container

    public class AdViewManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.tremorvideo.sdk.android.videoad.AdView.Container
    AdViewManager is only used when manually showing ads. It has various methods you must call to alert the ad of certain system level events.
